original: 樂安郡人，曹魏官員，亦是當代著名術士，尤其擅長解夢。曾以解夢之說，試圖阻止曹丕賜死甄宓，但最終為時已晚。
text: A native of Le'an County, Cao Wei official, and a famous contemporary warlock, especially good at dream interpretation. Zeng tried to prevent Cao Pici from dying Zhen Mi with the theory of dream interpretation, but in the end it was too late.
